price: "Jest, dolazio nam je onaj koji nas je upozoravao", odgovorit će, "a mi smo poricali i govorili: 'Allah nije objavio ništa, vi ste u velikoj zabludi.'"
arabic: قَالُواْ بَلَىٰ قَدۡ جَآءَنَا نَذِيرٞ فَكَذَّبۡنَا وَقُلۡنَا مَا نَزَّلَ ٱللَّهُ مِن شَيۡءٍ إِنۡ أَنتُمۡ إِلَّا فِي ضَلَٰلٖ كَبِيرٖ

version.title: Bosnian Translation - Muhammad Mihanovich
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Muhammad Mihanovich, printed in 2013. some referred verses corrected by Supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation, and development.

meta.transliteration: qālū balā qad jāanā nadhīrun fakadhabnā waqul'nā mā nazzala al-lahu min shayin in antum illā fī ḍalālin kabīrin
